template.currentUserDescription: Show the calendar of the current logged in user
template.userSearchDescription: Show a calendar of a specific user
template.groupCalendarDescription: Show a calendar of an Outlook group
template.resourceCalendarDescription: Show a room or resource calendar
template.jiraProjectsAsEventsDescripion: Show Jira project issues, using any date field (e.g. due date)
template.jiraFiltersAsIssuesDescripion: Show Jira issues from a filter, using any date field
template.jiraJQLAsIssuesDescripion: Show Jira issues from a JQL query, using any date field

officeCategoryColorSettings.useCategoryColorSubHeading: Show events with the category color instead of the calendar color

officeCalendarSharingSettings.calendarSharingSubHeading: Choose who can access the calendar
officeCalendarSharingSettings.unsharedDescription: Users with existing permissions can access the calendar
officeCalendarSharingSettings.sharedDescription: User with access to this page can access the calendar

officeEditPermissionSettings.fullPermissionsDescription: Users can create and edit events in this calendar
officeEditPermissionSettings.meetingRequestDescription: Users can add events by sending a meeting requests to this calendar
officeEditPermissionSettings.viewOnlyDescription: Users cannot create or edit any events in this calendar

officeEventDetailsSettings.fullDetailsDescription: Users can see all details of events
officeEventDetailsSettings.titleAndLocationDescription: Users can only see title and location of events
officeEventDetailsSettings.freeBusyDescription: Users see events as busy/available only

jiraCalendarSharingSettings.unsharedDescription: User with access to this page can access the calendar
jiraCalendarSharingSettings.sharedDescription: Users with existing permissions can access the calendar

jiraDateRangeOptionSettings.dateRangeOptionSubHeading: Choose how the releases appear in the calendar
jiraDateRangeOptionSettings.startToReleaseDateSubHeading: Display the release as a timeframe
jiraDateRangeOptionSettings.createdToDueDateSubHeading: Display the issues as a timeframe
jiraDateRangeOptionSettings.releaseDateOnlySubHeading: Display the release as a single day event
jiraDateRangeOptionSettings.customRangeSubHeading: Customize how the release is displayed

officeCalendarSettingsScreen.noSettingsPlaceholder: Everything is fine, there are no settings to configure here.

jiraLoginScreen.heading: Jira login
jiraLoginScreen.subHeading: To show dates from Jira, please sign in with your Jira account.

jiraLoginInitialScreen.heading: Jira Login
jiraLoginInitialScreen.description: To open calendars, you must first sign in with your Jira account.

officeLoginScreen.heading: Microsoft login
officeLoginScreen.subHeading: To show Outlook calendars, please sign in with your Microsoft account.

listViewSetting.heading: List view scope
listViewSetting.subHeading: Select how many days should be visible in the calendar list

schedulerViewSetting.heading: Timeline view scope
schedulerViewSetting.subHeading: Select how many days should be visible in the timeline

fixedDateSetting.heading: Fixed date
fixedDateSetting.subHeading: Select if the calendar should be fixed on a specific date

overlappingEventsSetting.heading: Overlap events
overlappingEventsSetting.subHeading: Select if simultaneous events should visually overlap

agendaViewSetting.heading: Calendar view scope
agendaViewSetting.subHeading: How many days should be visible in the calendar

calendarViewScreen.noSpaceEditPermission: It seems like you don't have space admin permissions

sidbarEmptyState.disabledEmptyStateText: You don't have the permission to add calendars. Only Confluence space admins are allowed to edit.
sidbarEmptyState.emptyStateText: It seems like you're the first one here.

jiraEndDateFieldSetting.heading: End date
jiraEndDateFieldSetting.subHeading: Select a field of the issue that should the end date of the timerange

jiraSingleDateFieldSetting.heading: Display date
jiraSingleDateFieldSetting.subHeading: Select a field of the issue that should the date of the event

jiraStartDateFieldSetting.heading: Start date
jiraStartDateFieldSetting.subHeading: Select a field of the issue that should the start date of the timerange

timeRangeSetting.heading: Select visibility
timeRangeSetting.subHeading: Choose from recommended dispayed based on a single date or a timerange

officeEventHover.eventSuccessFlagDescription: Succesfully copied event to your calendar
officeEventHover.copyToOwnCalendarFailedFlagTitle: Create event in own calendar failed

calendarListScreen.noCalendarSelectedMessage: It seems that something went wrong. Please select a calendar on the left side
